name: PRIVATE INVESTOR COALITION, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Discussions regarding how the Federal securities laws apply to single family offices, including H.R. 3972, The Family Office Technical Corrections Act.
Issues related to applicability of certain provisions of the U.S. Securities laws to "family offices."
Issues related to applicability of certain provisions of the U.S. Securities laws to "family offices."
Draft legislation to address the status of family offices under various United States securities laws.
Draft legislation to address the status of family offices under various United States securities laws.
